snippet: Michael Vick led the Jets to a touchdown on his lone series with the first-team offense during a preseason game in which Geno Smith, as he has during training camp, neither struggled nor starred.
abstract: Ben Shpigel On Pro Football column notes that New York Jets got offensive production they hoped for in team's preseason opener; backup quarterback Michael Vick led Jets to a touchdown on his lone series with first-team offense, but Geno Smith looks to be secure as starting quarterback.
lead_paragraph: Michael Vick led the Jets to a touchdown on his lone series with the first-team offense during a preseason game in which Geno Smith, as he has during training camp, neither struggled nor starred.

headline.seo: Geno Smith and Michael Vick Are Productive in Preseason Opener
headline.main: Jets’ Opener Goes as Envisioned at Quarterback
headline.print_headline: Jets’ Opener Goes as Envisioned at Quarterback
